channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-17496] Bootstrap repl is not cleaning up staging dirs
item.description: This will put more pressure on the HDFS file limit.
item.summary: Bootstrap repl is not cleaning up staging dirs

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12886282/HIVE-17496.1.patch

ERROR: -1 due to no test(s) being added or modified.

ERROR: -1 due to 4 failed/errored test(s), 11033 tests executed
Failed tests:

TestAccumuloCliDriver - did not produce a TEST-*.xml file (likely timed out) (batchId=230)
TestDummy - did not produce a TEST-*.xml file (likely timed out) (batchId=230)
org.apache.hadoop.hive.cli.TestCliDriver.testCliDriver[insert_values_orig_table_use_metadata] (batchId=61)
org.apache.hadoop.hive.cli.TestPerfCliDriver.testCliDriver[query14] (batchId=234)

Test results: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HIVE-Build/6754/testReport
Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HIVE-Build/6754/console
Test logs: http://104.198.109.242/logs/PreCommit-HIVE-Build-6754/

Messages:

Executing org.apache.hive.ptest.execution.TestCheckPhase
Executing org.apache.hive.ptest.execution.PrepPhase
Executing org.apache.hive.ptest.execution.ExecutionPhase
Executing org.apache.hive.ptest.execution.ReportingPhase
Tests exited with: TestsFailedException: 4 tests failed

This message is automatically generated.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12886282 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build
Test result looks good. daijy Can you please take a look?

I see you add staging dirs into the fsScratchDirs, but when Hive actually remove the fsScratchDirs? After all task finishes? Is it afterall the table/partition load task this ReplLoadTask adds. Also can you add a check to one of the test case in TestReplicationScenarios?
daijy The cleanup happens when the SQLOperation is done and the context is being closed. Will see if I can add a test.

Ok, you mean after the "repl load" sql commands finishes, right? That makes sense. However, I feel PathUtils is a bad name, it is not a utility class with static methods, it has states. Would it be better to change it to ReplStagingDirs?
daijy I agree that PathUtils should not contain state but should be a pure util class. However that's more of refactor work. Can we move that task to a separate jira?
Sure

daijy See "HIVE-17496.2.patch" for the added unit test.

cc thejas

ATTACHMENT ID: 12887600 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

According to the logs below, I did not see any error from HDFS deletion for the testDeleteStagingDir test, according to change in HIVE-17496.5.patch. Looks like the file should have been deleted successfully. So I don't know why the test fails.

2017-09-18T02:25:52,399  INFO [main] ql.Context: Deleting scratch dir: pfile:/home/hiveptest/104.198.168.233-hiveptest-0/apache-github-source-source/itests/hive-unit/target/warehouse/deletestagingdir_org_apache_hadoop_hive_ql_parse_testreplicationscenarios_1505726246743_dupe.db/unptned/.hive-staging_hive_2017-09-18_02-25-52_081_7805993483018006783-1

But in some other repl test logs, I do see some deletion that failed. It indicates some possibility there.

2017-09-18T02:25:49,746  INFO [main] ql.Context: Deleting scratch dir: file:/home/hiveptest/104.198.168.233-hiveptest-0/apache-github-source-source/itests/hive-unit/target/tmp/localscratchdir/6b15a44f-aec0-43f8-851d-81db07e4e329/hive_2017-09-18_02-25-49_687_551878613091072616-1/-mr-10001/.hive-staging_hive_2017-09-18_02-25-49_687_551878613091072616-1
2017-09-18T02:25:49,746 ERROR [main] ql.Context: File failes to be deleted when removing Scratch (HIVE-17496)

ATTACHMENT ID: 12887679 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

The cause to the deletion failure is because the table dir was deleted on target db for some reason. We did not try to drop the table so not sure why the table dir was deleted. See log below. This issue cannot be reproduced locally.

2017-09-18T12:49:20,642 ERROR [main] parse.TestReplicationScenarios: Error verifying the staging dir deletion
java.io.FileNotFoundException: File file:/home/hiveptest/130.211.162.127-hiveptest-0/apache-github-source-source/itests/hive-unit/target/warehouse/deleteStagingDir_org_apache_hadoop_hive_ql_parse_testreplicationscenarios_1505763609715_dupe.db/unptned does not exist

So for now the fix is to add a existence check.
